mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, s.* FROM ( SELECT bd.serial serial, bd.bookNo bookNo, bd.title title, bd.content content, bd.category category, bd.userId userId, to_char(bd.bDate, 'YYMMDD') bDate, bd.hit hit, bk.title_kor title_kor, bk.title_eng title_eng, bk.author author, bk.coverImg coverImg, bk.pDate pDate FROM DBOARD bd join DBOOK bk ON bd.bookNo = bk.bookNo WHERE bd.category = #{category} and bd.isDelete = 0 ORDER BY bd.bDate desc ) s ) WHERE rno BETWEEN 1 and 10
